channel.title: R on Alex Mwangi
channel.description: Recent content in R on Alex Mwangi

item.title: Alex's Blog
item.description: Created in R studio using Hugo and the blogdown package by the phenomenal Yihui Xie. You can create your own blog by reading his immensely helpful blogdown book. The theme is the minimal hugo-tanka by Nan Xiao. You can download it here. Helpful Links: [https://alison.rbind.io/post/up-and-running-with-blogdown/] [http://amber.rbind.io/blog/2016/12/19/creatingsite/]
